entities.name: the door
entities.description: The door is described as being slotted through the sides and a few even forced through the small window in the downstairs toilet.

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as staying at home again.

entities.name: the letters
entities.description: The letters are described as being burned by Uncle Vernon and then shredded in Aunt Petunia's food mixer.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as receiving twenty-four letters that were hidden inside eggs.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is introduced as shredding the letters in her food mixer.

entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Dudley is introduced as asking Harry who wants to talk to him badly.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon boarded up the cracks around the front and back doors.
Aunt Petunia shredded the letters in her food mixer.
Uncle Vernon made furious telephone calls to the post office.
Uncle Vernon also made furious telephone calls to the dairy.
